channel.title: Run.bat error
channel.description:
I don't know where the problem is. I don't have a backup os this is important.
Loaded WorldMap In (96 ms)... Server now loaded. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2154) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:555) at server.main(server.java:120)

item.title: Run.bat error
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

it means while you were coding u screwed up…

obviously u were trying to add npc drops or npcs. go to npchandler or watever u were in and see if u can see what u did wrong

Read full topic
